Details.Paregraph: Striving hard to achieve excellence had been the motto of JIT since its inception. We achieve it through highly dedicated and devoted faculties of our college. The alumni of JIT have fond memories of their alma mater and cherish happy memories.

Qualifications.Title: Governing Council Member - RST Cancer Hospital, Nagpur
Ex President - Vidarbha Contractors Association, Nagpur

Details.Paregraph: It gives me pleasure to put forth the ideal replica of hard work, integrity, talent, keenness, truthfulness with experienced and research oriented faculties. Jhulelal Institute of Technology is a resourceful institute with broad vision og giving students pleasant and healthy environment with advanced infrastructure facilities and professionally educated faculty members.

Progress of the institute depends mainly on performance of the students in academics, sports and cultural activities along with maintaining high level of ethics. I am proud to day that our students are doing excellently in academics, sports and cultural activities with great moral values.

Qualifications.Title: President - Fly Ash Brick Manufacturers Association, Nagpur

Details.Paregraph: Progress of the institute depends mainly on performance of the students in academics, sports and cultural activities along with maintaining high level of ethics. I am proud to day that our students are doing excellently in academics, sports and cultural activities with great moral values.

Qualifications.Title: Chairman - Vidharbha Region, Engg College Management Association, Maharashtra

Details.Paregraph: India is all set to become a superpower in terms of human resource. We at JIT educate the youth not only for how to make a living but also how to live. We provide excellent engineering educational opportunity to the youth of India.
Students participation in various activities reveal their passion within them. College provides many platforms to motivate them and explore.

JIT promotes research, exchange of ideas between academics, community and industry. Fosters entrepreneurship development. At JIT we encourage students to participate in various different activities reveal that their passion.
We believe in nurturing students talents, ingenuity and creativity. We also instill a sense of discipline and morality in them.

Qualifications.Title: President - Rotary Club Of Nagpur North

Details.Paregraph: Our mission is to impart quality engineering education for the welfare of technical and social community. The institute has partnerships with various renowned companies around the globe.
We strive to make JIT centre of excellence and institution that promotes thought leadership, nurtures excellence and creates a lineage of students that are a class apart.
